error.name: BUFFERTOOSMALL
error.description: a provided buffer is too small

error.name: COULDNOTLOADLIBRARY
error.description: the library could not be loaded

error.name: COULDNOTFINDLIBRARYEXPORT
error.description: a required exported symbol could not be found in the library

error.name: INCOMPATIBLEBINARYVERSION
error.description: the version of the binary interface does not match the bindings interface

method.name: GetLayerDataUUID
method.description: Retrieves the layerdata's uuid

method.name: GetSegmentCount
method.description: Retrieves the count of segments.

method.name: GetSegmentInfo
method.description: Retrieves the segment type information .

param.name: Index
param.description: Index. Must be between 0 and Count - 1.

method.name: GetSegmentProfileUUID
method.description: Retrieves the assigned segment profile uuid.

param.name: Index
param.description: Index. Must be between 0 and Count - 1.

method.name: GetSegmentPartUUID
method.description: Retrieves the assigned segment part uuid.

param.name: Index
param.description: Index. Must be between 0 and Count - 1.

method.name: GetSegmentPointData
method.description: Retrieves the assigned segment point list. For type hatch, the points are taken pairwise.

param.name: Index
param.description: Index. Must be between 0 and Count - 1.

param.name: PointData
param.description: The point data array. Positions are absolute in units.

method.name: GetZValue
method.description: Retrieves the layers Z Value in units.

param.name: ZValue
param.description: Z Value of the layer in units.

method.name: GetUnits
method.description: Retrieves the toolpath units in mm.

method.name: GetStorageUUID
method.description: Returns Toolpath storage UUID.

method.name: GetLayerCount
method.description: Returns layer count.

method.name: LoadLayer
method.description: Reads and returns a layer object.

method.name: GetUnits
method.description: Retrieves the toolpath units in mm.

class.name: Build
class.description: Build instance to access build files

method.name: GetName
method.description: Returns name of the build.

method.name: GetBuildUUID
method.description: Returns uuid of the build.

method.name: GetStorageUUID
method.description: Returns storage uuid of the build.

method.name: GetStorageSHA256
method.description: Returns SHA256 of the build stream.

method.name: GetLayerCount
method.description: Returns cached layer count of the toolpath.

method.name: LoadToolpath
method.description: loads the a toolpath into memory

method.name: UnloadToolpath
method.description: unloads the a toolpath from memory, if it has been loaded before.

method.name: ToolpathIsLoaded
method.description: checks, if a toolpath object is loaded to memory.

method.name: CreateToolpathAccessor
method.description: Creates an accessor object for a toolpath. Toolpath MUST have been loaded with LoadToolpath before.

method.name: AddBinaryData
method.description: Adds binary data to store with the build.

param.name: Name
param.description: Name of the attache data block.

method.name: CanTrigger
method.description: Returns, if signal channel is available.

param.name: ChannelIsAvailable
param.description: Returns true, if signal channel is available.

method.name: Trigger
method.description: Triggers a signal, if signal channel is available.

method.name: WaitForHandling
method.description: Waits until the signal is reset.

param.name: TimeOut
param.description: Timeout in Milliseconds. 0 for Immediate return.

param.name: Success
param.description: Flag if signal handling has been handled.

method.name: GetName
method.description: Returns the signal name.

method.name: GetStateMachine
method.description: Returns the signal state machine instance.

method.name: SetString
method.description: sets a string value

method.name: SetUUID
method.description: sets a uuid value

method.name: SetDouble
method.description: sets a double

method.name: SetInteger
method.description: sets an int.

method.name: SetBool
method.description: sets a bool

method.name: GetStringResult
method.description: returns a string value of the result

method.name: GetUUIDResult
method.description: returns a uuid value of the result

method.name: GetDoubleResult
method.description: returns a string value of the result

method.name: GetIntegerResult
method.description: returns an int value of the result.

method.name: GetBoolResult
method.description: returns a bool value of the result.

method.name: SignalHandled
method.description: Marks signal as handled and resets signal channel.

method.name: GetName
method.description: Returns the signal name.

method.name: GetSignalID
method.description: Returns the signal id.

method.name: GetStateMachine
method.description: Returns the signal state machine instance.

method.name: GetString
method.description: gets a string value

method.name: GetUUID
method.description: gets a uuid value

method.name: GetDouble
method.description: gets a double

method.name: GetInteger
method.description: gets an int.

method.name: GetBool
method.description: gets a bool

method.name: SetStringResult
method.description: returns a string value of the result

method.name: SetUUIDResult
method.description: returns a uuid value of the result

method.name: SetDoubleResult
method.description: returns a string value of the result

method.name: SetIntegerResult
method.description: sets an int.

method.name: SetBoolResult
method.description: sets a bool

method.name: PrepareSignal
method.description: prepares a signal object to trigger later.

method.name: WaitForSignal
method.description: waits for a signal.

param.name: TimeOut
param.description: Timeout in Milliseconds. 0 for Immediate return.

param.name: HandlerInstance
param.description: Signal object. If Success is false, the Signal Handler Object will be null.

method.name: GetDriverLibrary
method.description: Returns the driver type and library lookup for a specific registered driver.

param.name: DriverType
param.description: returns type identifier of the driver.

method.name: CreateDriverAccess
method.description: Accesses and locks a driver for the execution of the current state.

method.name: GetBuildJob
method.description: Returns a instance of a build object.

method.name: UnloadAllToolpathes
method.description: unloads all toolpath in memory to clean up

method.name: SetNextState
method.description: sets the next state

method.name: LogMessage
method.description: logs a string as message

method.name: LogWarning
method.description: logs a string as warning

method.name: LogInfo
method.description: logs a string as info

method.name: Sleep
method.description: Puts the current instance to sleep for a definite amount of time. MUST be used instead of a blocking sleep call.

method.name: CheckForTermination
method.description: checks environment for termination signal. MUST be called frequently in longer-running operations.

method.name: StoreString
method.description: stores a string in the current state machine

method.name: StoreUUID
method.description: stores a uuid in the current state machine

method.name: StoreInteger
method.description: stores a string in the current state machine

method.name: StoreDouble
method.description: stores a string in the current state machine

method.name: StoreBool
method.description: stores a string in the current state machine

method.name: StoreSignal
method.description: stores a signal handler in the current state machine

method.name: RetrieveString
method.description: retrieves a string from the current state machine. Fails if value has not been stored before.

method.name: RetrieveUUID
method.description: retrieves a uuid from the current state machine. Fails if value has not been stored before.

method.name: RetrieveInteger
method.description: retrieves a string from the current state machine. Fails if value has not been stored before.

method.name: RetrieveDouble
method.description: retrieves a string from the current state machine. Fails if value has not been stored before.

method.name: RetrieveBool
method.description: retrieves a string from the current state machine. Fails if value has not been stored before.

method.name: RetrieveSignal
method.description: retrieves a signal handler from the current state machine. Fails if value has not been stored before or signal has been already handled.

method.name: ClearStoredValue
method.description: deletes a value from the data store.

method.name: SetStringParameter
method.description: sets a string parameter

method.name: SetUUIDParameter
method.description: sets a uuid parameter

method.name: SetDoubleParameter
method.description: sets a double parameter

method.name: SetIntegerParameter
method.description: sets an int parameter

method.name: SetBoolParameter
method.description: sets a bool parameter

method.name: GetStringParameter
method.description: returns a string parameter

method.name: GetUUIDParameter
method.description: returns a uuid parameter

method.name: GetDoubleParameter
method.description: returns a double parameter

method.name: GetIntegerParameter
method.description: returns an int parameter

method.name: GetBoolParameter
method.description: returns a bool parameter

method.name: GetVersion
method.description: retrieves the binary version of this library.

param.name: Major
param.description: returns the major version of this library

param.name: Minor
param.description: returns the minor version of this library

param.name: Micro
param.description: returns the micro version of this library

method.name: GetLastError
method.description: Returns the last error recorded on this object

param.name: HasError
param.description: Is there a last error to query

method.name: ReleaseInstance
method.description: Releases shared ownership of an Instance

method.name: AcquireInstance
method.description: Acquires shared ownership of an Instance

method.name: GetSymbolLookupMethod
method.description: Returns the address of the SymbolLookupMethod
